short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Will help to complete a task by limiting the amount of distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Boost Your Focus and Productivity with Focus Helper!

Focus Helper is a powerful Google Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused and minimize distractions while working or studying. Say goodbye to mindless browsing and hello to laser-like concentration.

Key Features:

Focus Mode: Enter focus mode to eliminate distractions by closing unnecessary tabs and preventing new ones from opening.
Customizable Safe URL: Specify the website that is essential for your tasks, and Focus Helper will keep it open while closing the rest.
Seamless Integration: Effortlessly integrate Focus Helper into your workflow with its intuitive user interface and seamless performance.
Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone seeking to enhance your productivity, Focus Helper is your go-to companion. Stay on track, accomplish more, and achieve your goals with ease.

Install Focus Helper now and experience the power of focused work!"
